tasks.label: Run RTMPose Inference on Polar
tasks.command: bash -c 'source $(conda info --base)/etc/profile.d/conda.sh && conda activate rtmpose_env && python run_rtmpose_inference.py --dataset-dir dataset/polar --split val'

tasks.label: Launch FiftyOne Viewer (Polar)
tasks.command: bash -c 'source $(conda info --base)/etc/profile.d/conda.sh && conda activate rtmpose_env && python launch_fiftyone.py --source local --dataset-dir dataset/polar --split val --dataset-name polar-rtmpose'
